programme.title: 2023 Nathan's Famous Hot Dog Eating Contest
programme.desc: The annual 4th of July holiday tradition, taking place in Coney Island, features men's and women's competitions to see who can down the most hot dogs in 10 minutes.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: 2023 Wimbledon Championships
programme.desc: From the All England Lawn Tennis and Croquet Club in Wimbledon, England.

programme.title: ESPN Films
programme.desc: The most amazing, moving and exciting stories in the world of sports.

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali in the ESPN studio and joined via satellite by four panelists from across the country, the team debates popular sports stories. Reali acts as moderator, giving points for well-made arguments and deducting points for those who inspire him to hit the "mute" button. At the end of the show, whomever Reali deems the winner has 30 seconds without interruption to voice their final opinions on any topic they want.

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: WNBA Basketball
programme.desc: The Sun connect with the Mystics. Connecticut swept a home-and-home series against Washington in late May. Alyssa Thomas, who was named the Eastern Conference player of the month for June, totaled 36 points and 26 rebounds in those Sun victories.

programme.title: The Ultimate Fighter
programme.desc: Lee Hammond looks to end Team McGregor's five-fight losing streak when he faces Team Chandler's Kurt Holobaugh.

programme.title: Baseball Tonight: Sunday Night Countdown
programme.desc: Leading into each of ESPN's Sunday Night Baseball telecasts is this special edition of "Baseball Tonight." Host Karl Ravech teams with analysts and reporters to present fans a detailed preview of the network's exclusive, national game of the week. Highlights of the day's other games, interviews with players and managers, and key storylines from around the league also fill the hourlong show. Mark Teixeira, Eduardo Pérez, Tim Kurkjian and Buster Olney are among the analysts.

programme.title: 2023 MLB Draft
programme.desc: Coverage of the MLB Draft, with amateur players assigned to clubs at the highest level.

programme.title: X Games
programme.desc: Breathtaking action from the X Games with action from events like snowboarding and extreme skiing.

programme.title: The Ultimate Fighter
programme.desc: After an unexpected medical issue initially prevented their bantamweight fight, Team Chandler's Timur Valiev finally faces Team McGregor's Trevor Wells.

programme.desc: Carlos Vera looks to bring Team McGregor their first victory, hoping to stop Team Chandler's Brad Katona from becoming the first two-time winner of TUF.

programme.title: Boxing
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali seeks to avenge his loss to Joe Frazier in their first fight. The result was a classic battle of wills in what is considered an all-time great heavyweight fight. From Jan. 28, 1974 at Madison Square Garden in New York.

programme.title: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith joins host Molly Qerim on this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: UFC Live

programme.title: E60
programme.desc: Psychedelics may be the future of mental health treatment in sports. E60 follows a group of former athletes with a range of mental and physical conditions as they take part in a medical retreat involving psilocybin, aka Magic Mushrooms.

programme.title: Daily Wager
programme.desc: Doug Kezirian joins sports betting experts as well as ESPN analysts and reporters from various sports for discussion centered on analytics and point spreads as well as how the day's sports news affects betting.

programme.title: Bull Shark vs. Hammerhead
programme.desc: A rare event between top ocean predators was captured on video in Florida: bull sharks attacking a great hammerhead. Dr. Heithaus and a team of shark experts launch an investigation pinning one against the other.

programme.desc: Using a new experimental diving cage, two shark biologists investigate rising reports of bull sharks stealing from fishermen in northern Australia.

programme.title: MLB Baseball
programme.desc: The Marlins send out rookie Eury Pérez in their game against the Cardinals. Pérez was rocked for six runs and recorded just one out in his last outing July 1. The 20-year-old posted a 4-0 mark with a 0.27 ERA through his previous six starts.

programme.title: WWE Friday Night SmackDown
programme.desc: The Bloodline Civil War kicks off; Sami Zayn & Kevin Owens defend the Undisputed WWE Tag Team Titles against Pretty Deadly; Logan Paul is the guest on "The Grayson Waller Effect"; Charlotte Flair challenges Asuka for the WWE Women's Title.

programme.title: 147th Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show
programme.desc: Day 2 of the 147th Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show; the winning dogs across the seven AKC-recognized groups compete for the ultimate prize at the USTA Billie Jean King National Tennis Center.

programme.title: NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series
programme.desc: The NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series returns to action with the O'Reilly Auto Parts 150 at Mid-Ohio. Parker Kligerman won the debut running of this race last season before moving to the Xfinity Series. Corey Heim still holds the points standings lead.

programme.title: MLB Baseball
programme.desc: The Brewers and Reds continue their three-game NL Central series. Cincinnati prevailed in each of starter Luke Weaver's last seven outings. However, Weaver posted an 8.24 ERA in that stretch and is coming off his first personal victory in 10 outings.
